Bear Grylls The Island stars Marco and Jack offered to perform an oral sex act on another contestant after they were left so thirsty in a bid to get some water.

The cheeky duo hunted through the jungle to find a fresh water source, and jokingly propositioned Ivor, 55.

"Mate, if you find water I will suck your d***," 30-year-old Marco said, and Jack added "So would I."

And seeing the funny side of the joke, Ivor said: "Well, let us hope we find water then."

The boys went on to find water later in the programme, and the 55-year-old couldn't hide his excitement.

He joked: "Right, on your knees boys."

In the first week of the show, the group had been on the island just a few short hours when double glazing salesman Ben took to drinking his own wee in a bid to stay hydrated.

Viewers at home were particularly baffled by such drastic measures as Ben's co-stars were seen carrying bottles of clean water around with them.

"Too soon, buddy. Too soon," one told Ben.

"This idiot must have done that before. Even worse they have water," tweeted another.

"Sorry, but there is no way on earth I could drink me own wee. I'd rather drink sea water," cried a third.

Viewers also voiced their shock at the antics of Marco and Ivor during the Channel 4 premiere.

(Image: Channel 4)

The pair caused outrage when they told the others they were hunting for water whilst 'selfishly' looking for money to hide from their new pals.

Fans called out their 'snakey' methods on social media, branding the duo 'vile' and 'selfish' and 'next level disgusting.'

Marine Marco became self-appointed leader of the group early on but viewers at home are already anticipating his downfall.
description: The Island stars made a cheeky remark in return for some fresh water on the Channel 4 show
